attributes.action: Officially recognize the efforts of John Smeaton in helping to stop an attempted suicide attack at Glasgow Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Smeaton , a worker at Glasgow International Airport , showed true courage when he tackled a would be suicide bomber during the Glasgow Airport terrorist attack

This petition calls on the Government to give some sort of official  recognition of his bravery

More info can be found at

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/scotland/glasgow_and_west/6262266.stm
  
   http://www.johnsmeaton.com/
